Class Main

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Panel
                    |
                    +--java.applet.Applet
                          |
                          +--Main
public class Main
extends java.applet.Applet

This applet holds two graphical components: a TextField and a JSlider. The value shown by each component is the same. When one value changes as a result of a user action, the other value changes accordingly.

There is an observer, which is also a PropertyChangeListener, that observes or listens for changes in one component to force a similar change in the other component.

See Also:
Serialized Form
